data.text:
Les entrepreneurs tunisiens int√©ress√©s par le march√© alg√©rien !


Lors de mon passage √† l'√©v√©nement Smau organiser √† Milan - Italy

J'ai eu le plaisir de rencontrer des vingtaines d'entrepreneurs ambitieux, des investisseurs et des VC's, et avoir une id√©e sur l'√©cosyst√®me italien qui est en plein mouvement et croissance.

J'ai eu aussi l'occasion de rencontrer nos voisins marocains et tunisiens.

Plusieurs entrepreneurs tunisiens m'ont inform√© qu'ils veulent p√©n√©trer le march√© alg√©rien, dont Mohamed khedher qui a un projet ambitieux et int√©ressant √† la fois.

Ils m'ont tous pos√© la m√™me question : est-ce que les startups tunisiennes peuvent √™tre financ√©es en Alg√©rie ?

Algerian Startup Fund une opportunit√© pour les entrepreneurs tunisiens ? est ce que c'est faisable ?

Ps : j'ai profit√© de faire la promotion de notre pays ainsi que notre √©cosyst√®me, et de matcher des founders alg√©riens avec d'autres founders pour des collaborations.

Ps2 : Je vais commencer √† faire du sport la semaine prochaine, je dis √ßa depuis une ann√©e :)

highlightedComments:
I recently made the decision to transition from using the term "All in one" to employing the word "comprehensive" in describing our platform. Regrettably, the term "all-in-one" has become more of a trend than a representation of its true meaning ‚Äì a platform that seamlessly integrates a broad array of features, thereby reducing friction and enhancing user experience.

The widespread utilization of these terms also, in my opinion, influenced how users perceive new brands and products. Consequently, any product labeled with these terms is often categorized automatically as a "BS" standard trendy product.

highlightedCommentsActivityCounts.text:
I recently made the decision to transition from using the term "All in one" to employing the word "comprehensive" in describing our platform. Regrettably, the term "all-in-one" has become more of a trend than a representation of its true meaning ‚Äì a platform that seamlessly integrates a broad array of features, thereby reducing friction and enhancing user experience.

The widespread utilization of these terms also, in my opinion, influenced how users perceive new brands and products. Consequently, any product labeled with these terms is often categorized automatically as a "BS" standard trendy product.

data.text:
In a recent brainstorming with Ala Eddine Abid on the JTBD framework for Vndit.io, we came across the buzz word dilemma. 

Is "all-in-one" still conveying its original meaning or lost in the buzz?

The power of language lies in its ability to express ideas. "End-to-end", "seamless integration", and "AI-powered" were once authentic descriptors, not just buzz words.

In a landscape filled with impactful words, authenticity matters. While "all-in-one" might be impactful, the essence mustn't fade into the buzz. As story tellers, we hold the responsibility to communicate clearly.

Sometimes, a shift to a less bombastic term can maintain the message without the noise. It's about striking the balance between resonance and relevance.

Ultimately, it's not just about what's trending, but what truly defines our innovation. We'll choose words that resonate genuinely and stand the test of time.

And you, would you replace "all-in-one" by another word? Except "seamless" üòÇ 

#AuthenticCommunication #InnovationLanguage #StrikingBalance

data.text:
La Responsabilit√© Soci√©tale des Entreprises (RSE) offre aux entreprises la possibilit√© d'anticiper et de s'adapter √† un monde en constante √©volution. 
Cependant elle est souvent abord√©e de mani√®re trop technique, ax√©e sur les certifications et les labels, sans v√©ritablement produire les r√©sultats attendus. La RSE traditionnelle se concentre principalement sur les obligations r√©glementaires, sans apporter une r√©elle valeur ajout√©e ou une contribution √† la performance globale de l'entreprise
"Tu ne peux pas coller des ailes √† une chenille et appeler √ßa un papillon. Le changement doit venir de l'int√©rieur !"
Il est temps de repenser la RSE de mani√®re holistique.
Dans cette perspective, le marketing joue un r√¥le cl√© en sensibilisant les parties prenantes aux initiatives RSE et en cr√©ant une demande croissante pour des produits et services durables. L'accompagnement au changement facilite la transition vers une culture d'entreprise responsable, aidant les dirigeants et les employ√©s √† adopter de nouvelles mentalit√©s et comp√©tences.
En int√©grant cette alliance heureuse entre RSE, marketing et accompagnement au changement, les entreprises peuvent d√©passer les contraintes r√©glementaires et int√©grer pleinement la RSE dans leur strat√©gie globale. Elles cr√©ent ainsi une r√©elle valeur ajout√©e, renforcent leur r√©putation et contribuent activement aux d√©fis mondiaux.
#RSE #Responsabilit√©SocialeDesEntreprises #TransformationDurable #AllianceHeureuse

Moharram & Partners | Public Affairs and Strategic Communications (M&P) - #corporate #announcement 

We‚Äôre absoutely delighted and honored to welcome on board the renowned public policy expert Khaled Koubaa as our new Chief Strategy Officer (CSO). Mr. Koubaa will be responsible for overseeing M&P‚Äôs global expansion strategy including the establishment of two new permanent hubs in #Dubai and #washingtondc in 2023. 

An accomplished Public Policy and Government Relations expert, Khaled Koubaa has engaged for more than 20 years in researching, defining, delivering, and coordinating key global public policy strategies for top brands such as #Google and #Meta (formerly #facebook). He also served on the board of international institutions such as ICANN, @ISOC, @AfriNIC, and is a member of the #Internet #Governance Forum (IGF) multi-stakeholder Advisory Group. Mr. Koubaa was also on the Advisory Council of the Public Interest Registry and the World Bank Group Council on #civicengagement.

We are pleased to announce that Yoteqi¬†won the 1st prize after pitching during the POESAM¬†(The Orange Social Venture Prize in Africa and the Middle East)¬†organized by Orange at The Dot last week.

#Yoteqi #TheFutureOfNetworking #sustainability

data.text:
Super proud to announce that we won last week, the first prize after pitching during the POESAM organized by Orange at The Dot.

POESAM wasn't just a competition, it was a journey that i shared with 5 other amazing startups & friends, an amazing organizing team & top-notch mentors.

And behind every successful organization or competition, a woman dedicating all her time & energy to making POESAM a true success or even a LEGACY. Thank you Maya Jerbi for everything.

But wait, there's no Yoteqi without the team behind it that's why i  would like to dedicate this victory and thank the whole Yoteqi team for their hard work and commitment. They turned Yoteqi from an idea on a piece of paper to a viable product; transforming the way people network and engage with each other.
And I'm grateful to have an amazing mentor Jalel Ben Romdhane who was by my side for the last 12 months.

#Yoteqi #thefutureofnetworking #sustainability #POESAM2022
Jalel Ben Romdhane Nassef Otay Tabai Ala Eddin Ahmed Welhezi Zayneb Ben Aballah oussema hidri 1KUB, l'Incubateur

data.text:
We live in a world where groceries are available in 10 mins, but ambulances take up to 3 hours.

Where porn is free, but a university education costs lifelong debt.

Where NFTs generate $23 billion in volume, while governments struggle to cover $19 billion in energy price rises.

We live in a world where entrepreneurs systematically build "What People Want" - radically improving efficiency for things that cave to our base desires; while repeatedly neglecting ‚ÄúWhat People Need‚Äù - the things that empower us to be better versions of ourselves.

More than ever, we need to channel what we learned from the best of capitalist excess - supply chain efficiency, tokenized incentives, personalization at scale - towards social good. 

Some vectors are obvious, from climate tech to sustainable food supplies; some are less, from tradable tax instruments to purposeful social platforms. 

Each will require us to detach from the VC/startup zeitgeist, and push ourselves to move from product-market fit to product-society fit. It's time to build.

P.S. Considering launching a private community of impact entrepreneurs, investors, builders and creators who share this vision. You don't need to have started something, but should have skills accumulated in engineering/product/finance/strategy/ops etc. that you hope to channel towards socially impactful causes. DM or comment if interested.

#startup #tech #socialimpact

resharedPost.text:
As we prepare to celebrate the end of 2021, here is¬†#Africa's innovation ecosystem's in numbers, according to¬†Briter¬†upcoming annual¬†#investment¬†report:

üí∞ $4.9+ billion in known funding - about 2x since 2020. This figure combines disclosed transactions and dozens of non-publicly rounds made available to Briter by over 60 investors for the purpose of this annual publication.
üóû $4.65 billion in disclosed investments. This figure includes massive deals such as¬†Tala,¬†Zepz,¬†Zipline, whose operations extend to a few emerging markets beyond¬†#Africa, for a value of about $700 million.
üßÆ 740+ deals were announced, more than 25% compared to 2020. Out of these, about 500 were disclosed, but another ca. 35% of deals remain undisclosed. Estimates can be drawn based on the companies that have raised and their funding stage, but the total figure is unclear.
üê≥ The M&A market was more vibrant than ever, with over 30 known acquisitions, 88% of which though are undisclosed. These include sizeable companies such as¬†Capricorn Digital Limited,¬†Connect Ads, and¬†Parcelninja. Compared to 2020, where M&As accounted for about half of the total known investment, 2021 saw higher activity but a smaller role of M&A in the total value.
üí≥¬†#Fintech¬†remains the leading sector, with over two thirds of total investments, with the largest deals including¬†Wave Mobile Money,¬†Flutterwave,¬†TymeBank,¬†Chipper Cash, and¬†MFS Africa. The only other sectors with comparable deal sizes are¬†#cleantech¬†and¬†#logistics.
üåç¬†#Nigeria,¬†#Kenya,¬†#SouthAfrica, and¬†#Egypt¬†lead as key African markets, although this year saw a sharp growth in deals across¬†#FrancophoneAfrica¬†and 'Tier-2' markets, such as¬†#Ghana,¬†#Tanzania,¬†#Uganda,¬†#Ethiopia, especially as companies scale and expand to neighbouring countries.
üåà An assessment of about a decade of deals shows that all female-founded teams account for a mere 3% of total funding raised. In October, we launched a report with¬†The World Bank¬†on the subject.
üè¢ Corporate venture and innovation are becoming mainstream across Africa, with several giants such as¬†Google for Startups¬†launching new funds. Several corporates are making a difference in sectors such as financial technology and renewables.¬†Nedbank,¬†Standard Bank Group,¬†Absa Group,¬†African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank),¬†SoftBank Group Corp.¬†but also¬†TotalEnergies,¬†Mitsubishi Corporation,¬†Toyota Tsusho Group.
üí∏ At least $1 billion in new¬†#Africa-focused funds were announced in 2021. Dry powder is abundant but competition is getting high and cheap money coming from rich overseas funds may be challenging for local investors (but also an opportunity to enter early and strategically).
üêò Mega deals, above $100 million, are being normalised, as international investors flock to the continent. Out of 2021's Top-20 deals, 60%+ of investors were from the United States and the UK.

üèé Much, much, much more in our report. Sign up to receive it upon release, and here's a teaser:¬†briterbridges.com/reports!

data.text: Very interesting Report by Briter

Gemeinsam mit der Allianz Versicherungs AG entstand das Projekt f√ºr ein virtuelles Soft Skill-Training. Durch die authentischen virtuellen Umgebungen sowie den Einsatz von fotorealistischen Avataren wird das Gef√ºhl der Immersion perfekt.

data.text:
I am proud to announce that we (straightlabs GmbH & Co. KG) have won the #eLearning #Award (category: #virtualreality) for the second year in a row. 

Together with the Allianz Versicherungs-AG, we have developed one of the most advanced immersive #training programs that applies #gamification principles to the learning process and allows trainees to experience realistic training situations by interacting with photorealistic #avatars. 

It‚Äôs not just training. It‚Äôs an #experience.

We aim to help companies to secure and enhance the #business #success in the 21st century.

Dans quel domaine mon client op√®re ?
Dans la formation. 

Obtenir des r√©sultats pr√©visibles comme ceux que vous voyez maintenant n'est jamais le fruit de tactiques, de magie ou de strat√©gies sorties telles quelles d‚Äôun livre ou d‚Äôune vid√©o Youtube.

Tout ce que j‚Äôai mis en place. 
Tous les tests que j‚Äôai men√©s.
Tout ce qui a fonctionn√© et tout ce qui a √©chou√©.

C‚Äôest l‚Äô√©tude de cas la plus compl√®te que je n‚Äôavais encore jamais √©crite.

UPDATE: For anybody who hasn't received the link
https://bit.ly/2RK56Se

Evaluating Board Performance - A Guide for Early Stage Companies

Here‚Äôs the typical path to building a startup‚Äôs board: every time they raise money, they add someone from the firm leading the round as a director.

That‚Äôs all fine, early stage companies rarely require company boards to perform an annual self-assessment of their performance, such as well established corporate governance guidelines.

Here is a great template on evaluating the board‚Äôs performance on more than 30 topics in the following categories:
üîπ Structure and Culture of the Board
üîπ Board Meeting Mechanics
üîπ Evaluating, Compensating and Working with Management
üîπ Oversight of the Company's Financial Condition
üîπ Board Committee Assessment
üîπ Director Self-Evaluation

Use it to bring a new best practice in board governance.

Pro-tip: When forming a company‚Äôs board, diversity is an easy idea to get behind. A recent PwC survey of corporate board members found that 94% said diversity brings unique perspectives to boards, and 84% said diversity enhances board performance.
